summary.para: Contains classes required for DevExpress sparklines.
The Area sparkline view.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.AreaSparklineView.AreaOpacity

summary.para: Specifies the opacity (0-255) of the area sparkline.

member.value: A value from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).

member.param: A object (which is the descendant) whose settings are assigned to the current object. If null (Nothing in Visual Basic), then a will be thrown.

summary.para: Gets the type of the sparkline view.

member.value: Always SparklineViewType.Area.

summary.para: Copies all the settings from the object passed as the parameter.

member.param: A object (which is the descendant) whose settings are assigned to the current object. If null (Nothing in Visual Basic), then a will be thrown.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.EnableAntialiasing

summary.para: Gets or sets whether anti-aliasing (smoothing) is applied to the line view.

member.value: True to apply anti-aliasing to the line view; False to disable anti-aliasing.

summary.para: Gets or sets the size of an end point’s marker.

member.value: An integer value specifying the marker size, in pixels.

member.value: An integer value specifying the marker size, in pixels.

summary.para: Gets or sets the marker size of a data point that has the maximum value among all data points.

member.value: An integer value specifying the marker size, in pixels.

member.value: An integer value specifying the marker size, in pixels.

member.value: An integer value specifying the marker size, in pixels.

summary.para: Sets size for all markers of a sparkline.

member.param: An integer value specifying the new size for sparkline markers (in pixels).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.ShowMarkers

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying the visibility of point markers on a sparkline.

member.value: true to show markers for each data point; false to hide them.

Represents a range to be used in DevExpress Sparkline controls.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineRange.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified minimum and maximum limits.

member.param: A value, specifying the minimum limit. This value is assigned to the SparklineRange.Limit1 property.
A value, specifying the maximum limit. This value is assigned to the SparklineRange.Limit2 property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineRange.IsAuto

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not range limits should be calculated automatically.

member.value: true to calculate range limits automatically; false to use the SparklineRange.Limit1 and SparklineRange.Limit2 property values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineRange.Limit1

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying the first limit of the range.

member.value: A value that specifies the first limit.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineRange.Limit2

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying the second limit of the range.

member.value: A value that specifies the second limit.

summary.para: This event is hidden, because it is not appropriate for the class.

member.param: A object (which is the descendant) whose settings are assigned to the current object. If null (Nothing in Visual Basic), then a will be thrown.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.Color

summary.para: Gets or sets the color to draw a sparkline.

member.value: A that defines the color to draw a sparkline.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.CreateView(DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewType)

summary.para: Creates a sparkline view of the specified type.

member.param: A enumeration value specifying the type of view to create.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.EndPointColor

summary.para: Gets or sets the color to draw the end point of a sparkline.

member.value: A that defines the color to draw the end point.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightEndPoint

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight the end point of a sparkline.

member.value: true, to highlight the end point; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightMaxPoint

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight a sparkline point that has the highest value among all points.

member.value: true, to highlight a point with the maximum value; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightMinPoint

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight a sparkline point that has the lowest value among all points.

member.value: true, to highlight a point with the minimum value; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightNegativePoints

summary.para: Gets or sets the value that specifies whether to highlight the negative points of a sparkline.

member.value: true to highlight the negative points; otherwise, `false``.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightStartPoint

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight the start point of a sparkline.

member.value: true, to highlight the start point; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.MaxPointColor

summary.para: Gets or sets the color to draw a sparkline point that has the highest value among all data points.

member.value: A that defines the color to draw a data point with the maximum value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.MinPointColor

summary.para: Gets or sets the color to draw a sparkline point that has the lowest value among all data points.

member.value: A that defines the color to draw a data point with the minimum value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.NegativePointColor

summary.para: Gets or sets the color to draw sparkline points that have negative values (less than 0).

member.value: A that defines the color to draw data points with negative values.

summary.para: Occurs when any property of the object has changed its value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.StartPointColor

summary.para: Gets or sets the color to draw the start point of a sparkline.

member.value: A that defines the color to draw the start point.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.ToString

summary.para: Returns a human-readable string that represents the object.

member.returns: A value that represents the object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.Type

summary.para: Gets the type of the sparkline view.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying the view type.

summary.para: Invokes the Visit method of the specified visitor for the current object.
Lists the values used to specify the available view types of a sparkline.
Sparkline data points are represented as area.
Sparkline data points are represented as bars.
Sparkline data points are represented as a line.
Sparkline data points are represented as win and loss squares.
The WinLoss sparkline view.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Sparkline.WinLossSparklineView.Type

summary.para: Gets the type of the sparkline view.

member.value: Always SparklineViewType.WinLoss.

summary.para: Invokes the Visit method of the specified visitor for the current object.
